content.prompt: Scientists claim that a population of mammals with high genetic diversity is better suited to survive and reproduce in a given geographic region. Which of the following reasonings best justifies the scientistsâ€™ claim?

choices.label: High genetic diversity attracts more mates from other areas and increases the population size.
High genetic diversity improves the ability of individuals in the population to hide from predators and survive.
High genetic diversity increases the likelihood that individuals in the population possess traits that can withstand environmental changes.
High genetic diversity ensures that most individuals in the population have identical genetic makeup so that they can withstand environmental pressures.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
